General_Description: '''Prophecy Prevention''' was a virtual representation of one of [[Kassandra]]'s genetic memories, relived by [[Layla Hassan]] through the portable [[Animus|Animus HR-8.5]].
Section_Riddle: ''As a champion, time is your greatest competitor. Go to the [[Hippodrome, Olympia|Hippodrome]] and climb up the second column closest to [[Sanctuary of Olympia|Olympia]]. Look north towards the [[Kronion|peak]]. There, I will be sitting on the [[Statue of Kronos|right wing]] of a [[Titan]], [[Kronos|who]] had to swallow this lesson along with his pride.''
Section_Outcome: Kassandra found and recovered the engraving.
Section_References:
*''[[Assassin's Creed: Odyssey]]''
